---
id: get-payment-slip-pdf-pactual-id
title: "Download payment slip as PDF by Id"
description: "Api for downloading a payment slip as a PDF file. The response of this method is the actual PDF archive for the required payment slip. Simply copy and paste the request URL on your browser to download the PDF."
sidebar_label: "Download payment slip as PDF by Id"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: reference/transactions/btg-pactual-banking-as-a-service-transactions
custom_edit_url: null
proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Download payment slip as PDF by Id"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/payment/payment-slip/pdf/{pactualId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Api for downloading a payment slip as a PDF file. The response of this method is the actual PDF archive for the required payment slip. Simply copy and paste the request URL on your browser to download the PDF. 

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"pactualId","description":"Unique resource Identifier (Uuid) generated by api.","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true},{"name":"isBrlFormat","description":"Formatting to Brazilian pattern.\n\n|Code |Format|\n|----------|:-------------|\n|false|R$ 10,000.00|\n|true|R$ 10.000,00|\n","schema":{"type":"boolean"},"in":"query","required":false}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
